description: Important characters from Comic Book 1 who are not Legendary Nikes

protagonists.name: Stoner Nike
protagonists.role: Protagonist of Comic Book 1. The one who received Cthulhu's warning.
protagonists.fate: Unknown after Prime Era. Possibly still alive during The Long Silence.
quotes: Dude... the cosmic octopus just told me we're all gonna die.
We need warriors. Like, really good ones.

protagonists.name: Pico the Rooster
protagonists.role: Military connections. Helped organize the resistance.
accomplishments: Provided military support for the Champions
Organized logistics during Battle of the Colosseum

protagonists.name: Hennifer
protagonists.role: BETTY Project scientist. Developed interdimensional travel technology.
accomplishments: Worked with Shiro to open stable portals

protagonists.name: Shiro
accomplishments: Created anchor points for Nike Prime's trap
protagonists.fate: Critically wounded creating the trap's anchor points. Consciousness absorbed by Charles AI to preserve him. No longer exists as separate entity.
protagonists.legacy: Lives on within Charles AI. The cat-like personality quirks are his remaining expression.

scholarNikes.description: The minds who built Nike Prime. Not Legendary Nikes, but crucial to the Prime Era.

members.name: Engineer Nike
members.fate: Unknown. Possibly joined the Lost Builders.

members.name: Nutritionist Nike
members.contribution: CHARLES Fluid (endless nutrients for the growth tank)
members.fate: Unknown. Possibly joined the Lost Builders.

members.name: Botanist Nike
members.fate: Unknown. Possibly joined the Lost Builders.

members.name: Computer Coder Nike
members.contribution: Data transfer systems. Created Charles AI.
members.fate: Unknown. Possibly uploaded consciousness to Charles AI network.

scholarNikes.collectiveFate: The Scholar Nikes were hunted during The Long Silence. They scattered their knowledge across dimensions before being eliminated. Their legacy survives as the Lost Builders faction.

nikePrime.name: Nike Prime
nikePrime.description: Created from DNA of 5,548 Nike variants. Born at 99% completion—missing the empathy core.
abilities: Combined strength of thousands of Nikes
nikePrime.flaw: Cannot form bonds. Born from necessity, not love.
nikePrime.location: Inside the trap with Nolem. Still fighting. For thousands of years.
nikePrime.quote: I wasn't born out of love or happiness. I was created out of necessity and desperation.
nikePrime.prophecy: Nike Prime isn't one soul carrying 5,555. Nike Prime is 5,555 souls carrying each other.

charlesVariants.description: Charles variants who appeared in Comic Book 1
charlesVariants.note: The Charles Constant was possibly unstable during the Prime Era, explaining multiple variants.
members: Charles AI (created by Computer Coder Nike)
